meanings.sent1: The multihulled boat was very stable in the water.
meanings.sent2: The sailors preferred the multihulled vessel for its extra safety.
meanings.sent3: The multihulled ship looked like a floating island on the sea.
meanings.sent4: The multihulled design provided a unique advantage in rough waters.
meanings.sent5: The multihulled structure made the boat stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A boat or ship with multiple hulls.
meanings.sent1: The multihulled sailed smoothly through the waves.
meanings.sent2: We admired the sleek design of the multihulled in the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The multihulled ship seemed to glide effortlessly on the water.
meanings.sent4: The multihulled resembled a floating fortress on the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The multihulled vessel caught the attention of all who passed by.
